text: Abdelhamid Brahimi () (April 2, 1936 - August 15, 2021) was an Algerian politician. He was Prime Minister of Algeria under Chadli Bendjedid from January 22, 1984, until November 5, 1988. Brahimi was born in Constantine, Algeria. Brahimi died on August 15, 2021 in Algiers, Algeria at the age of 85.Décès de l'ancien Premier ministre Abdelhamid Brahimi à l'âge de 85 ans ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Algeria
title: Abdelhamid Brahimi
